message.body: Goodness you're wonderful. I am still searching! Any specific thoughts on the positions that have opened?

So I thought of the performance measures one first - they would love an mph - but it's pretty specific. Then the meetings/exhibit one came up, that's not public health-y, but a bigger department, lots of travel.
Let me know if you have any questions! I like working here a lot (except the commute), great benefits.
You're so awesome! I will definitely take a look and apply to a few! THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THINKING OF ME
Sure thing! Feel free to mention that I sent you, and let me know if anything looks really good, I'll put in a good word if I know the department!
